resources.string: The permission to use location services is needed to indicate your current position on the map, and to show nearby beacons.
The location is disabled. Please retry and grant the permission to reload the map.
The current position is not available. Please verify your settings and try again!
Authorization not valid anymore. Please log in again!
Do you want to close without saving?
Do you really want to remove this image?
Modifying this parameter can negatively affect the duration of the battery!
No internet connection detected. To apply changes, an internet connection is needed!
An error occurred. Please try again!
